name: Japan World Cup
description: Horse racing world finals. Japan World Cup! Holding of the race to determine the world of true was a long-held dream of Japanese horse racing fan decision. First prize, 1 billion yen of extraordinary well beyond the Dubai World Cup and the Arc de Triomphe prize. Can be played only top-notch thoroughbred, race of the world's highest mountain "Japan World Cup" was finally born. All of Horsemen's dream.
